name: One City's Adventure
description:
Brave architect faces the mafia and only his girlfriend Marketa could save him. The story, however, thickens and grandfather legionnaire or walking baguette enters the scene.

Classic hand-drawn tap & tap adventure detective story. Will you have a beer whe waiting for a train? It can influence the course or the end of the story. The diverse characters and situations are everywhere. The game was released in December 2012 in the web version, now Circus Atos brings it to your tablet.

Features:
- Hand-drawn graphics
- Funny and interesting dialogues. Lots of characters to talk to
- Decisions influence the course or the end of the story
- Game time approximately 50 minutes - ideal instead of evening TV series
- One touch control :-)

This is the first official game of Circus Atos studio. The authors have created it completely in just two months into Open the Eyes by Game competition, where they won first place. The aim of the competition was to create a game with a charitable theme. Circus Atos teamed up with the initiative Auto*Mat and originally planned simple strategy game became an urban adventure.

The game is in Czech and English language.
